title: Monospace Slab
content:
I recently came across the amazing branding for Arts Santa Monica. I know that the font in use is a custom font called ASM by Textaxis. Does anyone know any font like that. I don’t really care for the underlines, I’m merely talking about the shape of the letters: [http://sgustokdesign.com/archive/Cla-se-Arts-Santa-Monica.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140518073851/http:/sgustokdesign.com/archive/Cla-se-Arts-Santa-Monica.jpg "http://sgustokdesign.com/archive/Cla-se-Arts-Santa-Monica.jpg")

Thanks a lot in advance
author: ppete

comments.content: ASM is not exclusively licenced to the museum any more, so you could just buy it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140518073851/http:/www.type-o-tones.com/fonts.php?id=62). Or are you looking for something similar, but different?
